scripts.copy: rm -rf dist/raw && mkdir dist/raw && cp src/raw/download_card_data.json dist/raw/download_card_data.json && cp src/raw/download_skill_data.json dist/raw/download_skill_data.json && cp src/serviceAccount.json dist/serviceAccount.json && cp src/AIServiceAccount.json dist/AIServiceAccount.json && cp -n src/.env dist/.env || true
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run copy && forever stopall && forever start dist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run copy && node dist/index.js
scripts.start-windows: npm run build && npm run forever
